info.name: Equip blue cursor
info.description: Applies to -------> Windows - Mac os - Chrome os - Linux

style.css:
/*by sneekzxy*/

/* Start http://www.cursors-4u.com */ body, a:hover {cursor: url(http://ani.cursors-4u.net/cursors/cur-12/cur1138.ani), url(http://ani.cursors-4u.net/cursors/cur-12/cur1138.png), progress !important;} /* End http://www.cursors-4u.com */
